entry.title: Week 34, 2025: One PR opened to fix utop conflict clause capitalization and version bump release
entry.content:
Summary

One new PR opened for dependency conflict fix plus automated version bump

Activity

  • New PR opened by Vincent Laviron to fix utop conflict clause with incorrect capitalization (#73)
  • Version bump release to v0.18~preview.130.50+1016 updating package versions across the entire Jane Street ecosystem (2bd4fc7)
entry.summary: One PR opened to fix utop conflict clause capitalization and version bump release

entry.title: Week 27, 2025: One PR closed without merging - fix for ocaml_simd package moved to different repository
entry.content:
Summary

PR for ocaml_simd package fix was closed and moved to oxcaml/opam-repository

Activity

  • Compiler version update PR by Max Slater was closed without merging after being moved to oxcaml/opam-repository (#72)
entry.summary: One PR closed without merging - fix for ocaml_simd package moved to different repository

entry.title: Week 26, 2025: One PR opened to fix ocaml_simd package build issues
entry.content:
Summary

Single PR opened addressing compiler version update and build fixes

Activity

  • Compiler version update proposed by Max Slater to fix ocaml_simd package build issues in bytecode mode (#72)
entry.summary: One PR opened to fix ocaml_simd package build issues

entry.title: Week 24, 2025: Build system improvements and repository maintenance with significant package updates and macOS compatibility fixes
entry.content:
Summary

Extensive package version updates from v0.18~preview.130.33+516 to v0.18~preview.130.36+326 across Jane Street libraries with patch improvements

Activity

  • Package version synchronization across entire Jane Street ecosystem with systematic updates from v0.18~preview.130.33+516 to v0.18~preview.130.36+326 affecting core, async, bonsai, and dozens of other libraries
  • macOS compatibility improvements by Max Slater including basement stubs fixes (#67), parallel stubs fixes (#65), core_unix and heartbeat stubs updates (#64), and basement patch adjustments (#63, #62)
  • Build system fixes by Joel Reymont addressing posix_spawn permission denied errors on macOS through shell script permission handling improvements (#71)
  • CI/CD workflow development by Puneeth Chaganti with GitHub Actions for testing package installations, though both PRs were closed to redirect to the oxcaml repository (#69, #68)
entry.summary: Build system improvements and repository maintenance with significant package updates and macOS compatibility fixes

entry.title: Week 23, 2025: Two build-related issues reported by [Nathan Farlow](https://github.com/nathanfarlow) for ocaml-index and base packages
entry.content:
Summary

Two compilation issues reported affecting ocaml-index with OPAMJOBS=1 and base v0.17.2 syntax errors

Activity

  • Compilation issue with ocaml-index.1.1+jst reported by Nathan Farlow when using OPAMJOBS=1, suggesting missing yojson dependency (#61)
  • Syntax error in base v0.17.2 preventing ocaml-lsp-server installation reported by Nathan Farlow, with workaround using base.v0.18~preview.130.33+516 (#60)
entry.summary: Two build-related issues reported by [Nathan Farlow](https://github.com/nathanfarlow) for ocaml-index and base packages

entry.title: Week 22, 2025: Jane Street opam repository updated with v0.18~preview.130.33+516 release affecting 200+ packages, plus utop fixes and mdx support
entry.content:
Summary

One ongoing ppx_deriving compatibility fix with additional work on package installation issues

Activity

  • PPX compatibility work ongoing with @art-w addressing ppx_deriving compilation issues with OxCaml and ppxlib.0.33.0 compatibility (#49)
  • Package installation debugging by Nathan Farlow identifying base v0.17.2 compilation failures and providing workaround with preview version (#60)
  • UTop stability improvements completed with @art-w fixing autoprinter crashes through proper error handling (#59)
  • Tool integration enhanced by Etienne adding mdx 2.5.0 support with required AST and type changes for OxCaml compatibility (#56)
entry.summary: Jane Street opam repository updated with v0.18~preview.130.33+516 release affecting 200+ packages, plus utop fixes and mdx support

entry.title: Week 21, 2025: Major repository restructuring with dune pkg compatibility and platform-specific fixes for macOS
entry.content:
Summary

Repository restructuring, platform compatibility improvements, and build system enhancements

Activity

  • New pull request opened for ppxderiving compilation fixes by @art-w to make ppxderiving work with OxCaml without adding extension support (#49)
  • Major restructuring merged including dune pkg compatibility, package folder reorganization from packages/pkg.X.Y.Z to packages/pkg/pkg.X.Y.Z structure, removal of init-* packages from PATH pollution, and init-compiler upgrade to 4.14.2 (#54)
  • Platform compatibility improvements with NixOS script fixes merged (#57) and README.md documentation updates (#52)
  • MDX support completion with version 2.5.0 merged enabling markdown documentation processing with oxcaml compiler (#56)
  • ARM64 runtime patches including macOS fixes for huge pages compilation and x86_64 stack overflow handling improvements
  • Build system cleanup removing outdated META files and bootstrapping packages while maintaining opam switch compatibility
entry.summary: Major repository restructuring with dune pkg compatibility and platform-specific fixes for macOS

entry.title: Week 20, 2025: Major repository reorganization enabling dune pkg compatibility and compiler upgrade to OCaml 4.14.2
entry.content:
Summary

Package compatibility fixes merged with extensive JSofOCaml toplevel work and ppx_deriving compatibility improvements ongoing

Activity

  • Dune package management compatibility achieved through comprehensive repository restructuring by @art-w, moving 931 files and removing outdated bootstrap packages to enable seamless integration with dune pkg workflows (#54)
  • Core library fixes merged including alcotest patch for local value restrictions by @art-w (#46), utop compilation fixes (#47), and lwt_ppx compatibility improvements (#48)
  • Documentation improvements completed by Cuihtlauac Alvarado updating README.md installation instructions to use dynamic version discovery instead of hardcoded preview strings (#52)
  • Base library dependencies standardized with forced preview version requirements implemented across multiple packages (#51)
  • Large-scale JSofOCaml toplevel integration work in progress by Patrick Ferris applying comprehensive patches for toplevel functionality with JS extensions, involving 81 changed files and 8,396 additions (#55)
  • PPX_deriving compatibility work ongoing by @art-w to enable compilation with OxCaml extensions, though not yet adding full extension support (#49)
entry.summary: Major repository reorganization enabling dune pkg compatibility and compiler upgrade to OCaml 4.14.2

entry.title: Week 19, 2025: Package release with ARM64 runtime fixes and community discussion on uniqueness mode implementation
entry.content:
Summary

New PR for ARM64 runtime fixes opened, with ongoing community discussions about uniqueness mode behavior

Activity

  • ARM64 runtime fix PR opened by Matthew Else to backport critical changes from flambda-backend for effects and locals on ARM64 (#45)
  • Package maintenance activities including closure of previous ARM64 build fix PR that was superseded by compiler updates (#36)
entry.summary: Package release with ARM64 runtime fixes and community discussion on uniqueness mode implementation

entry.title: Week 18, 2025: Repository faced compilation issues with OCaml 5.2.0+flambda2 across several packages including alcotest, utop, and topkg
entry.content:
Summary

Week focused on package compatibility issues with OCaml 5.2.0+flambda2 affecting compilation across multiple packages

Activity

  • Build compatibility issues reported by Anil Madhavapeddy with alcotest failing to compile due to local/global value constraints in OCaml 5.2.0+flambda2 (#41)
  • utop compilation problems in with-extensions branch identified by Cuihtlauac Alvarado involving missing pattern matching for Misplaced_attribute (#39)
  • Local switch creation issues when dune-project files are present reported by Cuihtlauac Alvarado due to unsupported dune version constraints (#42)
  • Architecture-specific build failures for ocaml-intrinsics-kernel on aarch64 linux discovered by Jon Ludlam with missing builtin recognition errors (#40)
  • topkg compilation errors in both with-extensions branches due to portable/nonportable value mismatches reported by Cuihtlauac Alvarado (#38)
entry.summary: Repository faced compilation issues with OCaml 5.2.0+flambda2 across several packages including alcotest, utop, and topkg

entry.title: Week 6, 2025: Two PRs opened for ARM64 and async_ssl compatibility fixes targeting modern toolchain support
entry.content:
Summary

Two new PRs opened addressing ARM64 build compatibility and async_ssl patches for modern toolchains

Activity

  • ARM64 compatibility fixes opened by Matthew Else including backport for ARM64 runtime assembly bug (#36) and async_ssl patch for modern toolchain support (#37)
  • Both PRs target build system improvements for newer development environments, with the ARM64 fix addressing assembly directive mismatch and async_ssl patch enabling compilation on ARM64 Linux systems
entry.summary: Two PRs opened for ARM64 and async_ssl compatibility fixes targeting modern toolchain support

entry.title: Week 48, 2024: Single issue reported about odoc compilation failure with OCaml compiler variants
entry.content:
Summary

One new issue opened regarding compilation problems with odoc package

Activity

  • Compilation issue reported by Patrick Nicodemus for odoc package failing with OCaml variants.5.2.0+flambda2 compiler (#35)
entry.summary: Single issue reported about odoc compilation failure with OCaml compiler variants

entry.title: Week 46, 2024: macOS compatibility fixes merged and build issues resolved for bleeding-edge-with-extensions
entry.content:
Summary

macOS sigwait patch merged while OCaml 5.2 package updates closed pending upstream fixes

Activity

  • macOS compatibility restored with Anil Madhavapeddy merging sigwait patch for oxcaml compilers (#34)
  • OCaml 5.2 package updates by Nick Roberts closed without merging pending upstream dependency fixes including ocamlbuild 0.15.0+jst (#31) and starter packages for with-extensions-dev branch (#32)
  • Build compatibility issues resolved for bleeding-edge-with-extensions with @dkalinichenko-js closing long-standing merlin and uuseg compilation problems (#27)
  • dune macOS thread issues fixed by Anil Madhavapeddy addressing Thread.wait_signal errors on M2 chips (#29)
entry.summary: macOS compatibility fixes merged and build issues resolved for bleeding-edge-with-extensions

entry.title: Week 45, 2024: Major compiler update with macOS dune crash fix and extensive package version bumps across Jane Street libraries
entry.content:
Summary

Two merged PRs addressing critical macOS compatibility and comprehensive package updates

Activity

  • macOS compatibility fix merged by Anil Madhavapeddy resolving dune crashes on Apple M2 systems through sigwait patch implementation (#34)
  • Major compiler update completed by @dkalinichenko-js involving 89 changed files and 32,000+ additions across the Jane Street package ecosystem (#33)
  • Issue resolution for long-standing macOS dune error reported by KC Sivaramakrishnan and fixed through the sigwait patch (#29)
entry.summary: Major compiler update with macOS dune crash fix and extensive package version bumps across Jane Street libraries

entry.title: Week 43, 2024: Three PRs opened for OCaml 5.2 compatibility and tooling improvements, all awaiting resolution
entry.content:
Summary

Three new PRs opened addressing OCaml 5.2 compatibility and development tooling enhancements

Activity

  • OCaml 5.2 compatibility work initiated by Nick Roberts with ocamlbuild update (#31) fixing 5.2+flambda support and starter packages fixes (#32) including patched versions of merlin, lsp, utop, and ocamlformat
  • Development tooling exploration with draft PR adding merlin/lsp packages (#30) for testing and demonstration purposes
entry.summary: Three PRs opened for OCaml 5.2 compatibility and tooling improvements, all awaiting resolution
